lclpupdater.title: Update available
lclpupdater.desc:
LCLPServer 5.0 requires an update.
Please update the game through LCLPLauncher.
lclpupdater.startfailed:
Could not start LCLPLauncher automatically.
Please exit Minecraft and start it manually.

Please Note: You have to click the 'Update' button in the LCLPServer 5.0 Tab!
